reviewText: If you are a true Bruce Lee fan. Path of the Dragon is the movie to see!!! Back when Chuck Norris was always challenging Bruce to fight him, Bruce just ignored Chuck. Well when Bruce decided he was going to do the movie Path of the Dragon he asked Chuck Norris to be in the film on 1 condition when the fight seen with Bruce Lee & Chuck Norris in the movie it would be ( REAL) Yes REAL. So when you hear Chuck Norris's leg break in the movie it really was broke by Bruce Lee. And after that a beautiful Lifelong friendship was developed with Chuck & Bruce. See this movie!!!!! And Bruce or Chuck fan will love it.
